definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Ephraim (Ge 41:52 connected with [[הִפְרָה]], Hiph. of [[פרה]], cf. [[פרא]] Hiph. Ho 13:15).

2nd son of Joseph Ge 41:52, Ge 46:20; reckoned among sons of Jacob, blessed by him, and given preference over Manasseh Ge 48:1, Ge 48:5, Ge 48:13, Ge 48:14, Ge 48:17, Ge 48:17 (cf. v:Ge 48:19) v:Ge 48:20, v:Ge 48:20, Ge 50:23, Nu 1:10, 1Ch 7:20, 1Ch 7:22.

[[הַר־אֶפְרַיִם]] the mountain-country of Ephraim, a ridge stretching from N. to S. through territory assigned to Ephr., with fruitful land on both slopes, esp. the western (cf. Di Jos 16:1) Jos 17:15, Jos 19:50, Jos 20:7, Ju Jdg 2:9, Jdg 3:27, Jdg 4:5 + 26 t.

by Ho & Is (rarely later) [[אֶפְרַיִם]] = kingdom of northern Israel (from Ephr. as largest & strongest tribe in it) Ho 4:17, Ho 5:3, Ho 5:3, Ho 5:5 (‖[[יִשְׂרָאֵל]]) v:Ho 5:11; v:Ho 5:12 + 30 t. Ho; Is 7:2, Is 7:5, Is 7:8, Is 7:9, Is 7:17 + 9 t. Is; also Je 7:15, Je 31:9, Je 31:18, Je 31:20, Ez Eze 37:16 (del. Co) v:Eze 37:19, Ps 78:9, 2Ch 25:7, 2Ch 25:10 cf. 2Ch 30:1, Ps 60:9 = Ps 108:9; ´[[עָרֵי א]] 2Ch 17:2 cf. 2Ch 34:6; ´[[שְׂדֵה א]] Ob:Ob 19; hence ´[[א]] alone in loc. sense 2Ch 31:1; also Ho 5:9, where fem. (& perh. Is 7:2). †
[[יִעַר אֶפְרַיִם]] 2Sa 18:6, E. of Jordan; LXXL Klo rd. [[יער מַחֲנַיִם]] cf. 2Sa 17:24, 2Sa 17:27. †
name of a city near Baal-hazor 2Sa 13:23 (= )Efraïm Jn 11:54 & 1Ma 11:34 ? Klo comp. LXXL Gofraim & [[עפרון]], Qr [[עֶפְרַיִן]] 2Ch 13:9; so previously Bö Th Ke cf. Dr). †
[[שַׁעַר אֶפְרַיִם]] a chief gate of Jerusalem 2Ki 14:13, 2Ch 25:23, Ne 8:16, Ne 12:39; perh. at NW. angle, near Holy Sepulchre, cf. Schick-Guthe:ZPV 1885.
